text:
HyreCar | Los Angeles | Developer | Full Time | REMOTE OK HyreCar is car sharing platform where you can rent your car to Uber/Lyft drivers. We're a friendly, fast growing start at a very young age (2 months old). Pay is low (sorry!) with high equity.

The current stack is Angular, PHP, MySql. Please don't feel limited if you think you'd be a great match but are familiar with something else.

If you get excited about helping others get jobs, saving people from poverty, giving them the right tool for the on-demand economy, then we'd love to hear from you!

Feel free to email me directly and I'll make sure your resume gets seen: abhi [at] hyrecar.com
